passive.name: CURSED TOUCH
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CURSED TOUCH
                                Attacks curse the target to take an additional 10% true damage from incoming magic damage for 3 seconds. Subsequent applications of Cursed Touch will refresh its duration.

q.name: (Q) BANDAGE TOSS
q.description:
(Q) BANDAGE TOSS
 3s   35/40/45/50 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Bandage Toss charges are stored every 13/12.5/12/11.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.Active: Launches a bandage that deals 60 magic damage (60/95/130/165 + 70% ) and stuns the target for 1 second, pulling himself to the target.Range: 9.

w.name: (W) DESPAIR
w.description:
(W) DESPAIR
 1s   10/11/12/13 
                                
                                
                                Toggle: Begins weeping to deal magic damage equal to 30/35/40/45 plus 1.4% (2/2.2/2.4/2.6% + 0.60% ) of their maximum Health to nearby enemies every second.

e.name: (E) TANTRUM
e.description:
(E) TANTRUM
 9/8/7/6s   35 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Takes 1 (1/3/5/7  + 3%  + 4% ) reduced physical damage.Active: Deals 90 magic damage (90/120/150/180  + 50% ) to nearby enemies and slows them by 20% for 0.5 seconds.Tantrum's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds when Amumu is hit by an attack.

r.name: (R) CURSE OF THE SAD MUMMY
r.description:
(R) CURSE OF THE SAD MUMMY
 105/95/85s   100 
                                
                                
                                Deals 150 magic damage (150/250/350 + 80% ) to enemies and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.Applies Cursed Touch.Effect Range: 4,75.

core_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.
